name: Recedric - DEMO
description:
Recedric is an action RPG that is currently in development.  

Cedric is a warrior prince that is summoned from the grave to take part in a cruel tournament.  

  • Fight enemies in bosses in different arenas.
  • Avoid a multitude of traps.
  • Master combat and dashing abilities in order to survive.
  • Gain items to help aid you through your quest.
  • I need help writing a more creative description.

This demo contains the first three areas of the game.  It is largely untested and therefore may contain bugs.  I will try to address any issues I find as well as feedback related to gameplay.  

CONTROLS

Movement Direction Keys Attack Spacebar Dash Shift Use Item X Next Item Z Pause Escape
